title: Beautiful teen girl home on college break found naked, raped and murdered after jogging with her dog.   What happened to Mandy Stavik?
itunes:title: Beautiful teen girl home on college break found naked, raped and murdered after jogging with her dog.   What happened to Mandy Stavik?
description:
Mandy Stavik takes off on an afternoon jog with her German Sheppard. The dog comes home. Mandy does not. With Nancy Grace today to discover the details of this case: Judge and trial attorney Ashley Wilcott, former detective Steven Lampley, DNA expert George Schiro , Medical Examiner Dr. Katherine Maloney, Psychologist Dr. Carla Manly and reporter from KIRO 7 Joanna Small.


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
